periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4pm. Partly sunny. High near 89, with temperatures falling to around 85 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 12 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 4am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 67, with temperatures rising to around 69 overnight. South southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Friday
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 1pm and 2pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 2pm and 3pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 3pm and 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly sunny. High near 87, with temperatures falling to around 82 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 7pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 1am. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly clear, with a low around 62. Southwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 82. West wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. Northwest wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 78. East northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Sunday Night
